website_summaries.verdict: This primer from a trusted brand in hair care helps detangle wet, curly hair as well as protect it from sun damage.
pros: Contains a "cross-linking polymer" that ensures every curl is controlled and moisturized
cons: If you don't already have quite curly hair, you may not notice a significant difference

customer_reviews.title: Buy it- amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow this stuff is incredible. My hair just isn’t that nice- super thick, but neither curly nor straight, mostly dry and frizzy. Until now... I used a wide tooth comb to run conditioner through in the shower, then towel dried and used a small amount of this while my hair was very wet, even spritzed with water as I put the product through. Then I let it naturally dry and you can see the result in the pic. Not crispy in any way- just soft, flowing hair with natural curl and minimal frizz. It’s my new cant-live-without product. Wow.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I do use an infuser tho so I won't get that crispy wet curl.
customer_reviews.author: nohemi blancarte

customer_reviews.title: Catwalk Curls Rock
customer_reviews.text: The product is very sticky and heavy. Not good for thinner very curly hair. It’s also very drying and leaves a film. Contacted seller and they said Amazon would refund my money. NOT SO! Not happy about it. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: bobogold

customer_reviews.title: Great for waves!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, my hair just got 10000 times better thanks to this stuff. Let me start by saying I dont even have curls. My hair is slightly wavy, and this brought the best out of my hair. It also smells amazing. Kind of like Yankee's Sun and Sand. I put it all through my fairly damp hair, wet my hands, scrunched, and let it air dry. When it was dry, I shook out the curls a little to make it look softer. It isnt the slightest bit crunchy! My hair is sooo soft now.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Roob

customer_reviews.title: Absolute favorite curly hair product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love and swear by this product if you have curly hair! I have purchased so many different curly hair products that have just not done the trick but this is not one of them this leaves my hair feeling moisturized my curls hold strong and it doesn’t leave any flaky residue like moose or hairspray! I only have to use one pump on each half of my hair I apply it wet and let my hair air dry and my curls have never look so healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: This curl cream is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on when my hair is very wet. Then dry with a micro fiber? towel. I scrunch up my hair and go to bed with my hair still damp. The next morning my hair is so curly and soft! I was shocked the first time I tried it. My hair is so soft now. In the morning I wet my hands and put some of the curl cream on my hands and scrunch my hair. If I need more I might spray my hair with water and scrunch some more. This stuff really works great! I don't give many reviews like this! My friend says my hair is very shiny too!
customer_reviews.author: R. Freckmann

customer_reviews.title: Favorite curl cream
customer_reviews.text: My favorite hair product. I have curly hair - not kinky curls, not frizzy curls, but full, somewhat loose curls. My hair is ULTRA soft, but I find this cream keeps my curls in-tact and doesn't straighten them out like other creams do. I use only 1 pump - a little bit goes a LONG way (and I have a lot of hair.....down to my chest, but also very thick). Clean smell. Cannot beat this price because it is $19 for ONE at ULTA. I always order from here.
customer_reviews.author: carissa

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived without a cap but I used it anyway, and liked the results. The product did a really good job of separating the hair and controlling frizz.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: The best I've used so far
customer_reviews.text: I found this as one of the top reviewed products on Amazon and decided to give it a try when I wanted to try a better curl product. I'm not surprised that it has been reviewed so highly! I love the pump, so you get the same amount no matter what. A little goes a long way. I have very thick hair, but one pump is plenty. I have 2b curls, and I really feel like this product amplifies my natural curl. It air dries a little crunchy but diffuses to be nice and soft and natural feeling. I think I need to find something else for frizz control, but for amplifying and holding curl it really does rock.
customer_reviews.author: Rolen K. West

customer_reviews.title: This product is Everything...the Black Bottle, not the Blue for thick wavy hair
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why there are 2 products of the same name made by TIGI, but if you want your curls and waves to take shape and hold then get the black/green bottle and not the blue one. The blue is creamier and leaves my hair drier. The black bottle shapes and holds the curls and does not dry out my hair. I have very thick way hair and the black bottle has been a revelation. I keep a layered bob and with a huge diffuser I get the most beautiful curly waves with definition. I use a flat iron to play with random ends. Love this product. The Black bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Insabella

customer_reviews.title: Good for second day curls.
customer_reviews.text: I have curly/wavy hair 2C type. It's long and prone to frizz. This did not eliminate frizz as much as I'd hoped for. But it does have a good hold that is soft to touch. My hair actually looked better on day 2 and I was even able to go a day 3 which is very uncommon. It has some weight which is bad if you want tons of volume, like I did. But I think it's the weight that made it relax for days 2-3 yet still keeping its curl. I'll continue to use this because it's pretty good but definitely not there best for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Elehuiliztli

customer_reviews.title: Fake??
customer_reviews.text: This product came in a box and had no seal or wrap or anything at ALL. Which is odd, Because usually there is plastic wrap or something around the lid which shows it is a new product. It smells fine, and I guess the consistency is okay? I am concerned it may be fake and possibly expired. I do think it made my curls stand out more after air drying, but didn't help with frizz or moisturizing. Didn't meet the expectation for being a TIGI product, and wasn't worth the $ for the results.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Fine for Fine Hair.
customer_reviews.text: Before I begin, let me just say that I have fine, super straight, super unruly hair. I wanted something that could make it curl, even just wavy, SOMETHING OTHER THAN FLAT. This worked the first week, but somehow my hair got used to it and then it stopped working. All it did was make my hair crunchy. I did everything that I was supposed to and diffused my hair, but it always fell flat. I will keep trying and see if it improves. OH, and quick tip. If you have fine hair like me, MAKE SURE you do a buildup cleanser at some point because this stuff is hard to wash out. I needed special shampoo to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Initially I didn't care for this product, it didn't seem to do much for my hair. I put it away and tried some other products (Noodle Head, FrizEase and a couple of others). I tried it again several weeks ago as I just can't seem to find something that holds my limit waves. This time I used only a pea size amount, rubbed it between my hands and then wet my hands thoroughly and applied it to wet hair and then used the diffuser to dry my hair and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hite

customer_reviews.title: The best for curly hair--especially biracial hair
customer_reviews.text: If you have curly hair this is IT! I am biracial have difficulty finding products they are either too heavy or not enough moisturizer! Put on hair super wet (section hair and use a generous amount). Hair will dry crunchy. When dry, take a t-shirt and scrunch out the crunch. You hair will be soft and curly and WILL resist humidity! At night put up loosely on top of head (pineapple), then next day shake, spray a tiny bit of water and a dime size amount of product and keep it moving! This stuff works!
customer_reviews.author: Angel B Houston

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry, fly away, frizzy curly hair and have always had a hard time finding products that keep my curls in check. Along with great conditioning products and very little drying time this product works great! Totally worth the money. The cheap crap doesn't do squat!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff's Copilot

customer_reviews.title: Makes my curls rock!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of natural wave and curl and I've tried countless products to tame my hair. This Catwalk is the best by far! I get defined curls with control and shine but not crunchy curls. This is one of the only products I've bought a second time and I'll keep buying this one because it truly makes my curls rock!
customer_reviews.author: Amus

customer_reviews.title: Defective packaging x2 / I’m done
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, however the pump mechanism is poorly designed and won’t work. I initially bought the product from my salon. I ordered 1x from Amazon, no problem. The next time I ordered it was defective, could not get pump to prime, could not get product out, went to the trouble to return and replace and get another one. Same story! Ridiculous! I ended up having to cut into the thick plastic and putting the product in a plastic ziplock bag. Gross, sticky.. tried several types of bottles. Not good. I’m done with it. What a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for curly hair to get soft ringlets with no frizz
customer_reviews.text: Comb out your wet hair in the shower, rinse to get the hair into ringlets, shake your head to get rid of extra water, scrunch hair with a towel (never, ever rub) and then scrunch a tiny amount of this stuff into curliest parts. Bend over and do the undersides, too. Now don't touch it again - just let the curls dry and run your fingers through any parts you want fluffier. That's it: don't touch it again, and never use a hairbrush, cause all that does is frizz.
customer_reviews.author: Ayla the Mensan Artist

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't Worked For Me
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I haven't found the right way to use this product. Maybe I'm using too much or not enough. Maybe I need to use it in conjunction with other products. I have tried using it on my hair from very wet to towel dried. All this product did was make my waves more "stringy" and made my hair hard and crunchy, no matter how much I use. It also made my hair more poofy and frizzy than normal. 2 stars because it wasn't the worst product I've ever used on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: pattythek

customer_reviews.title: Defines and holds your waves/curls
customer_reviews.text: I have wavy fine 2a hair and recently cut 6 inches off. I needed a product that would help define and hold my natural wave but wasn’t crunchy and that I could use if I air dry or diffuse w the blow dryer. This seems to work great so far. It smells amazing too! I rub about a quarter size amount on my fingers and then scrunch through my wet hair and then let hair dry or use heat. It definitely leaves that kind of sticky film on my hands so I have to wash them after I apply but it comes right off. My waves look effortless and hold all day.
customer_reviews.author: Leah D.

customer_reviews.title: Received used bottle
customer_reviews.text: Works. The price online is cheaper than ulta which is why I bought it on amazon. However, this seller shipped me a used bottle. Arrived with cap off, scratches and product was squirted everywhere. When something is new you need to pump it a few times, for this I did not need to. Would give five stars if it was not tampered with.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to all curly haired friends!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My salon stopped carrying it! Glad amazon has it!! Stays sticky for a bit but once dry it's great for curly hair!! Nice that it doesn't have to look "crunchy". Also nice that it can be dried with a hair dryer (with diffuser) or air dried! Recommended to many curly haired friends (even had one ask me what I used!! Which is always a nice compliment!) It does have a smell kinda like apple-ish. Not a bad smell. Might be overpowering for some...
customer_reviews.author: Josie S

customer_reviews.title: Best product for curly/wavy hair
customer_reviews.text: I have tried numerous other products for curly hair and have been very disappointed with the results, and have FINALLY found what I was looking for! My hair is slightly curly and wavy. All I do is apply Catwalk to towel dried hair, and fluff up my hair vigorously and when dry, I have curls and waves. This is a great product and one I will use over and over!
customer_reviews.author: Anne L.

customer_reviews.title: I hope they never stop making this product
customer_reviews.text: My hair is a bit unruly. It is fine but also curly and I have a lot of it. Most people have course curly hair. Well fine, thick, curly hair tangles and gets frizzy. I have used this product for several years, ever since my hairdresser started using it. My hair has a tendency to be really curly in some places then just wavy. I found I can use this and a diffuser and make it look more even. It never frizzes and it conditions so my hair is easy to come out. If you have curly hair I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: the best curl gel!
customer_reviews.text: i've been using this stuff for about 3 years now and it's THEEEE best curl gel i've tried - and i've tried like a billion. you *need* to use a leave in conditioner below it though, otherwise your hair will be super dry. in my opinion, it works best if you apply a little too much (i have pretty long hair and i use about 2 pumps) so that your hair turns crunchy and then sleep on it overnight. half the crunch will be gone and you can just get the rest out with your hands. i guarantee you that your curls will look great if you follow those instructions, i've had awesome results.
customer_reviews.author: kfairy

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: My hair is like half curly/half straight and it does this thing in humidity where it just frizzes out of control. This product is amazing! I absolutely love it. My hair is actually manageable when I put this in. Would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Just but Aussie, it works the same
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. Not as good as I expected. I really wanted to try dream curls but after googling products this was supposed to be similar but a lot cheaper. It's really thick and sticky, don't use as much as you would other products because it will be too much. Smells great. When I used the diffuser my hair got frizzy so I wouldn't suggest that. If I use it on towel dried hair, scrunch it then it will feel hard so I go back through and scrunch it once it's dry to get the crunchy out and it looks cute but not crunchy. So it still works okay but similar to Aussie products but cost more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have thick, wavy, untamable hair. I put a little bit on my hands, mix it with water and just scrunch my hair and let it air dry. My curls look defined without looking like I have product on my hair. It creates a very natural look, which I love. I hate gooey product hair. Or stiff hard. A little goes a long way. Seriously. I have a LOT of hair. My first bottle lasted me almost a year.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I realize everyone's hair is different, especially curly hair! So this is just my personal experience w this product, take it for what it's worth, but holy cow this product sucked! Sorry not sorry but it did not hold my curl all day, it left my hair somehow feeling dry. And very crunchy which I hate. It felt and even sounded like straw. I experimented w different amounts, used a diffuser, air dried, dried w/out a diffuser. No matter how I styled my hair this did not work for me. Complete waste of money for me personally.
customer_reviews.author: PrincessSparkles

customer_reviews.title: Its the best product for defining my curls
customer_reviews.text: Its the best product for defining my curls. It hold frizz out for a full day. I apply a 1/4 size on my hands right after the shower and i use a diffuser to dry my hair and i am good all day.
customer_reviews.author: Maurizio E.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing from my husband's amazon account - it most certainly maintains the curl! Be careful not to use too much or you'll end up with the 80's crunch look - literally, a dime-sized dollop will do you well. I have the curly on the bottom and straggly on top thing going on and this product did well to address that. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Doc Holliday

customer_reviews.title: My curls have never looked so good
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely curly hair but it is always so unmanageable. I just bought this stuff to try because I’m sick of hair spray and hair gel and the crunchy look. I am sold! This stuff is amazing. My curls are the best I’ve ever seen and it really helps the friz too. Since I’ve bought this, brushing my hair has never been as easy. No knots what so ever compared to the past products I have used. I love it!! And it smells amazing too!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail of Products
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and buy this immediately. It is my new holy grail of hair products for curly/wavy hair! I run about a dimes size amount all throughout my wet hair (after shampooing) and then start twisting my curls. That's it, just let it air dry and may be diffuse it for a few minutes when it's almost dry. I run my hands through to unleash the curls and they are perfect every time. I will never be without this product again!
customer_reviews.author: J M J

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair crunchy!
customer_reviews.text: It smells divine--like the yummy herbal brand (not sure if I can list another brand here but you know which I mean!), but it doesn't leave my very curly hair soft. I have to use leave in conditioners and some type of oil like argon or macadamia oil to keep from it being frizzy (live in humid Texas) but I'd hoped this alone would have worked and I wouldn't need to buy so many other things. It's less crunchy than using straight mousse but certainly not like I was expecting from all the positive comments about it's softness! Definitely worth it it if you don't mind a little and want it to smell like apples! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Works great and for a long time
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a product that won't give out by the end of the day this one is for you. You'll even get multiple days out of it even if you don't want it. It smells good and works well but it is so sticky and when it's wet it's slimy. It is so hard to get out of your hair. It takes at least 3 shampoos to get it out or at least to not feel it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Favorite curly hair gel
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a lot of different hair products for my curly hair and keep coming back to this one. I have a weird routine where I use this right after the shower, towel, then also use tressemme mousse but it works for me! (Pic to show my type of curly hair)
customer_reviews.author: StacieandLuna

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this but I just can't. It's so sticky and maybe I got a defective can but it doesn't do anything to my hair but make it sticky and hard. I've tried several amounts and nothing works for me so I am dissapointed I spent so much on this!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn D

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This product (in combination with a shampoo, conditioner and leave-in conditioner specifically for curly hair) changed my hair from something I was always trying to straighten to it’s natural, beautiful curly self! You don’t need to use a lot, it has a great scent and it lets my curls be light, not frizzy and good for up to three days later. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS HAIR PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect hair product to use with curling iron! Hold curls in place, but does not leave your hair stiff or sticky feeling. Very natural and it smells fabulous! I purchased TIGI CATWALK to use with the KISS PRODUCTS INSTAWAVE AUTOMATIC CURLER. I wash my hair, towel dry and completely coat with CATWALK, separate into 6 sections and curl! Looks professionally done.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Smells fantastic, but WAY too slimy
customer_reviews.text: Slimy texture putting it on, although it does dry, but as soon as it gets wet again it goes back to being slimy. And it's not the kind of product you can just re-wet the next day, you have to wash it out and start over again. Next day feeling is my hair is stiff and feels like I have a blanket on my head...which already having thick curly hair is not a welcome feeling. So, it didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine hair!
customer_reviews.text: Hands-down the best products for curly hair that I have found. I have fine hair, between wavy and curly, it is a pain in the butt. I have tried every combination of gel, cream, moose or mixture and never had anything that holds my curls or keeps frizz down like this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Great curl separation
customer_reviews.text: love this product! Tried a few others and this has great curl separation and leaves hair soft and bouncy
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have long, curly hair. I've been using this for many years. It's still the best product for my frizzy and unruly hair. It smells amazing. You do have to wash your hands afterward because it leaves a film on your hands. But I have tried too many other products and they never perform like this. Plus it is so much cheaper online than retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: salesgirl555

customer_reviews.title: works better than most products I've used
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about two weeks, I think I'm still perfecting the amount that my hair needs as well as the best application methods. if too much is used it definitely results in stiff/crunchy hair. Other reviewers suggestion to apply with wet hands is good, thinning the product down with some water seems to help it distribute more evenly and decreases the chance of applying too much. I dry wiht the xtava Balack Orchid Large Hair Diffuser, I do not think this product would work well for air-drying.
customer_reviews.author: workin'Mama

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine hair with some curl/wave. I wanted a product that would enhance my natural curl. This product was awesome! My curls/waves were more defined. The product left my hair a bit stiff but I am okay with that... it keeps the curls intact!
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Umm this is the exact same thing that they sell at Walmart/target for 15 dollars. What the heck. And it’s bigger the only difference is the dispenser. I love this stuff. I have seriously long, curly, thickkkkk hair and it makes my curls look amazing and omg the smell is amazing imo.
customer_reviews.author: Ale M

customer_reviews.title: Great for fighting frizz
customer_reviews.text: Having tried a few gels, this is the best one I've found for minimizing frizz. I wash my hair once a week and have very little frizz between washes.I also like the gel cast and like how my hair feels after I break the cast. Great gel.
customer_reviews.author: Arun Pingali

customer_reviews.title: Big, natural curls - okay product.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been loyal to the Kenra Curl Creme and thought I’d give this a whirl with its high reviews. It leaves a crunchy looking appearance and feeling in my natural, big curls. I’m not a fan of that. When I rinse my hands after use it feels like there’s a ton of product still on my hands. It’s okay for the price but I prefer Kenra.
customer_reviews.author: dmc0708

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Cannot do without it! You must but really must use it when your hair is wet! Take the hair towel off, comb your hair and apply this! My medium length hair needs only quarter coin size of this product. I apply it towards the end of my very loose curls then also apply a bit of strong hold hair gel. No frizz afterward. I'm happy to find it on Amazon. Great price, great delivery and great product.
customer_reviews.author: N.B.

customer_reviews.title: NOT SALON QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: The quality doesn’t even compare to the one I bought in the salon. My hair frizzes in some spot and almost hardens in others. The one from the salon wasn’t like that AT ALL. I’m very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Walker

customer_reviews.title: My favorite curly hair product
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many hair products and this by far is my go to. I love the way it holds my curl shape, and I don't have to use hair spray anymore. I use to have to hair spray my hair after using hair gel, but with this product you don't have to. It shapes my curls so pretty. I get compliments all time time, and I always recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmina M.

customer_reviews.title: Huge Fan of This Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a difficult time finding the right product for my curls. I have very fine hair, so it seemed I would always end up with a product that weighed my hair down too much. I use Catwalk Amplifier when my hair is damp and while blow drying with a diffuser. I also put a little between my fingers to shape odd curls or fly aways. This product works great!
customer_reviews.author: ShopFashionPolice

customer_reviews.title: The Bomb!!
customer_reviews.text: All you need is a pinch of this amplifier and it bring out your wavy or curly hair.. I’ve been you using this product for many years and it does the trick every time.. Nothing like it and I haven’t going anything close to it.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Gerena

customer_reviews.title: smells good! No hold but thats okay
customer_reviews.text: smells great. Very light weight but no hold. I mixed it with a gel ths that some hold and works better Alone it keeps hair really soft. Honestly has same feel as deva curl cream for less money !
customer_reviews.author: K Quinn

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is all u need for curls!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff rocks! I had super curly hair but when I got my hair cut short, my curls dissapeared. A little squirt of this stuff and boom! I got curls again. It does make my hair a little crunchy but not bad. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: eh
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a product that is really great and enhances my natural curls. But once I put it in, I can't really touch it all day, nor does it give the feeling that you would want to. I bought this based on reviews, that it would leave your hair still soft and you could run your fingers in it throughout the day. This has not been my experience. It has the same texture as my other product, plus it doesn't hold as well.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne malarae

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love with this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this stuff. I have naturally curly dark Caucasian hair. I’m 40 and my hair hast started to become thinner and more relaxed. I used this with bed heads Small Talk (thickifyer) and then put this midway through to the ends up my hair and I get nice, not crunchy, curls. It’s a new favorite for me.
customer_reviews.author: Calchristy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect at the night, but all gone in the morning...
customer_reviews.text: It's not as good as I imagined. 1. If I put a lot, it will create pretty curve but also make my hair sticky. 2. I usually use it in the night.But every time when I use it to create a perfect style and go to sleep. In the morning, everything is gone... I am not sure if I should give it more chances or just throw it
customer_reviews.author: Viola

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not change products but I was not in love with Deva or KMS paste for my curls. After my shower, I have always put paul mitchel round trip on then follow it with KMS to define the curls. I try to wait a half hour befor putting on second product if I can. I tried this after reading reviews and this is awesome. It defines my curls and my hair feels soft.
customer_reviews.author: llc

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived very fast!! A lot of people with straight hair might think it makes their hair curly (it does not) but it is if you do have slightly wavy hair, it’s a great way to bring that out. It does not leave any crunch and it dries easily leaving any type of hair moisturized and soft. My hair is usually straight as ever but when i get out of the shower (do not brush your hair when it is wet!!) i put some on and it dries nicely and enhances waves i didn’t even knew i had!! Great product. Five stars all around.
customer_reviews.author: CHAD W ANDREWS

customer_reviews.title: I'd like to give this 4.5
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to give this 4.5 stars if I could. I expected this to be a mouse and when i realized it was a thick, somewhat sticky cream I had very low expectations. BUT it made my curls really soft (and I used a decent amount) and I loved the look! But by the end of the day I had to boost my hair with another product - the curls were almost too soft. But overall, I do like this product and will continue to use it. Did a really good job with frizz.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: I little goes a long way. It smells nice. It feels sticky but if you put it on wet hair it works well. I havent seen a huge change in my curls but it does help with holding rhe curls for a full day.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika

customer_reviews.title: Great way to help curls out while allowing a slow ...
customer_reviews.text: This makes my daughter's curls so soft and it does amplify her wavier hair towards the back of her head (2B), however her 2A hair that rests on top of her head and around the sides by her ears it doesn't really add any curls (which I had a hairdresser friend tell me no curl products to that). A little plopping though and it does seem to help. If you don't know what plopping is, look it up! Great way to help curls out while allowing a slow dry using a cotton t-shirt. (You're welcome!)
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Won't use anything else
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally curly hair and have tried many products over the years. This is by far the best product I have found and will not use anything else. Does not leave it looking "wet" as long as you only use one pump (my hair is down to the middle of my back). Leaves it very soft and natural looking.
customer_reviews.author: RhonHamm

customer_reviews.title: CATWALK EVAL
customer_reviews.text: I love catwalk products my disappointment came when I ordered this and it did NOT say the word " CURLESQUE " because that is all I've ever used and love it and was even further not a happy camper because when I complained about it the seller said no returns because of this type of product packaging regulations, but as it turned out even without that word in it ...it seem to be the same great product...that's why I still rated it a five star
customer_reviews.author: dottie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent curl Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have been using it over ten years. It helps to keep my curls organized. It doesn’t make my hair feel hard, does not have a scent. If you reset it it revives itself. Well worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: joy A sundstrom

customer_reviews.title: A sticky mess.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this product at all. I gave 2 stars because of thesmell ( really nice smell). This is the way I applied to my hair. I let me hair air dry for about 15 minutes,then I start with diffuser amoing up my curls. I applied just a little product through my curls in an upward motion. I found I had to continue putting more and more in. End result sticky uneven curls. It didn't define or Amplify my curls at all. That's what I get for trying something new. I will stick with Shea moisture curl enchaning smoothie. It works magic.b
customer_reviews.author: Mememe

customer_reviews.title: The original product is a lot like this one
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. The original product is a lot like this one. I didn't see much of a difference. I am surprised that there bad reviews at all. I have tried different products that have been recommended to me throughout the years by salon stylists or friends saying they really like another product so I try it when I run out of this Curls Rock Amplifier. I have always come back. It keeps the frizz down and the curls soft. I use a diffuser on my hair dryer and that ensures my curls are soft.
customer_reviews.author: romer

customer_reviews.title: If you have curls and want to show them off...this is all you need!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best product I’ve ever used to amplify and hold my curls! Even lasts all day out on the beach. I purchased a bottle for every friend I have with curly hair...and now we all swear by it! I don’t even use a diffuser any more...I don’t need it!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Best curl cream (after many fails)
customer_reviews.text: My hair was mostly straight my whole life. Come to find out, it was because I was brushing it too often and not using the right products. I have naturally wavy hair that gets ringlets under the right conditions. This curl cream is the first that reliably makes my hair wavy to borderline curly. I use a very tiny bit on towel dried hair, apply only midway to ends, and let air dry. My hair is soft and supple, no stiffness or stickiness. I am so glad I bought this product!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great product for curly hair; good company to buy from
customer_reviews.text: Top Shelf Brands was excellent. Product came as promised and more quickly than I expected. TIGI Catwalk product is the only one I use on my curly hair after trying many, many other products. My curls last up to 3 days, even with sleeping and working out. Although crunchy after hair dries, just scrunch your hands underneath and hair becomes soft (or wait until day 2, when that happens automatically).
customer_reviews.author: Michel

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS PRODUCT! it smells amazing. I get complimented on it like it’s a perfume. Keeps my 3C curls tamed and most importantly NOT FRIZZY. I love how it has a bit of a hold to it. I apply it in sections of 6-8. Only need a few squirts. It doesn’t really work well with other products, as it can leave a bit of a film on your hair if you have dark hair. I personally don’t need to apply anything else. Leaves my hair shiny and bouncy all day! Works nice with a diffuser as well. I say try it if you’re interested in a all-in-one product
customer_reviews.author: Shanda

customer_reviews.title: Rocking waves
customer_reviews.text: Read a lot of reviews, and having previously used a TIGI product, decided to give this a chance. It works amazing in keeping my waves in place and without frizz. Some people complained about it leaving a white residue in your hair, I haven't experienced this, and I think it's quantity related. I used about a pea-sized amount and it's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Just try it !
customer_reviews.text: I have a little natural wave my hair and I wash it every couple days. I just wet it just a little bit and use some of this and it gives me great curl and finish with spray gel. It's texture is sticky on your hands but not in your hair. Your curls aren't crunchy either. Smells good.
customer_reviews.author: A.P.Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for curls
customer_reviews.text: Great product that doesnt leave your hair feeling dry. It smells amazing. Mix in your hand with a little water and rub it through your hair! Used this stuff forever
customer_reviews.author: rhianna

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff!! If you follow what other people are telling you to do, it works AMAZINGLY!! Make sure your hair is VERY wet before you apply, and do not use heat! Just keep scrunching your hair until your hair is dry. My hair is curly but tends to get frizzy as the day goes by and this helps TREMENDOUSLY!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Andino

customer_reviews.title: Does what it claims to do!
customer_reviews.text: I put it on wet hair and sleep with it in for a very tousled look. Love the scent, which is mild, and the ease of use. Little bit goes a long way :)
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: best anti frizz for high humidity
customer_reviews.text: living in Texas, our humidity is intense. all hair styling products either leaves my hair frizzy, or stiff as a board. this gel leaves my curls soft to the touch and natural looking, but prevents frizz and locks in the moisture. I'm a rather cheap person and this gel was more than i wanted to spend at first, but i've tried many different cheaper gels and decided this gel is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Riley Knippa

customer_reviews.title: Best yet
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally curly hair and I love this product. It makes my hair slightly crispy when first dried with diffuser but once I run my fingers through my curls, the crispness is gone. It holds for days and keeps frizz under control.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have curly hair. Really curly hair. It gets frizzy and I always need some sort of product in it. Let me just say that I adore this product. It removes the frizz and leaves my hair with the curl. No more frizz! It took me 40 years to finally find something that works!
customer_reviews.author: T Riley

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Though it did come without a cap, it still did its job! my hair is mostly straight but it has a tendency to create weird waves depending on how it's positioned ex. laying down, sitting and laying my head against something, if my hair is behind my ears etc. so i wasn't sure if it would work for me but it did wonders! it kind of sticks together if not properly combed through but doesn't make my hair look any different. I love it😊
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Hartje

customer_reviews.title: Decent for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: There are not many curly hair products. This is one of the better ones but if you have a lot of hair it’s expensive and you need a good amount. It smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for slightly wavy hair
customer_reviews.text: I was really exited when bought this product. I read it gonna help my slightly wavy hair to get more curl. But this product didn’t work on my hair at all! I followed the instructions and tried couple times. But I didn’t get any curls and my head is itchy. In addition, the item came without a cap. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasiia Syvak

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice but builds up
customer_reviews.text: I have always enjoyed this stuff for curly hair however, only use a little bit if you have fine hair. It also tends to build up if used too often.
customer_reviews.author: JESSIE

customer_reviews.title: Kinky Curls Defined!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product for my natural 4b kinky curls. Found out through a YouTuber. Unfortunately, it will not mixed with other products, such as leave ins or gels... it will flake... badly! So just test before mixing with other products.
customer_reviews.author: Mesha

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this product!!I had been using the Strictly Curls cream which did absolutely nothing to bring out my curls. Left my hair in a frizzy mess! But this product locks in my curl without making it look to greasy. You can tell I have a bit of product in my hair but its lightweight and does a great job of bringing out my curls
customer_reviews.author: ceniza11

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. At first I thought that this won't last long as the container was smaller than most other brands I buy. This turned out not to be an issue since you use so little of it. Although I had very curly hair as a child it has gotten much straighter with age and coloring. This brings back the curl. I have layered hair that is just slightly below the bottom of my ears. Definitely worth trying if you want to return the curls to your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Love Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use too much.
customer_reviews.text: If you have very fine thinning hair, the secret is to use only a little. I pump a little into my palm, add water and thin it out. Then rub throughout your hair. I let my hair dry naturally, occasionally fluffing with my fingers. Then I brush it out for softness.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Came without lid and pump did not work so I couldn't even use it
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and I have used it before many times. HOWEVER, when I received the product, there was no lid on it and it was leaking all over inside the package. Not only that, but the pump that allows the product to come out did not work so I was unable to use any of the product inside at all. Not sure how to even take off this specific kind of pump, so I can't use the product that is inside even though it is full. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Morgaveli

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! This gives me the big curly hair I’ve always wanted. Works best with a hair dryer with diffuser on cold. A little goes a long way and it’s very easy to use too much. Hair needs to be very wet to work best. I love this and it leaves my hair curly and soft it’s amazing!
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: My new permanent addition to my hair routine
customer_reviews.text: All women with curly hair know the struggle. We've all tried to find that perfect combination of products that get our curls looking just right. I've rotated through tons of different combinations of hair care products over the years but this one I'm sticking with. It really defines your curls and keeps them looking hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: January Brown

customer_reviews.title: Crispy curls
customer_reviews.text: This makes the old school crunchy curls. I applied it to fairly damp hair but the consistently of the cream is pretty sticky and tacky. Even with the use of a diffuser my hair was crunchy and stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Justine D

customer_reviews.title: Great for.curls
customer_reviews.text: Great for moderately curly hair. Boticelli style curl according to Curly girl book. Not much hold, I had to mix it with mousse. I like Not Your Mother's mouse with purple on the label.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for Curly girls!! A must have for me
customer_reviews.text: I have thick, coarse, curly hair. I LOVE this creme. It is my second product everyday ( first is Argan oil, then Catwalk Curlesque, then gel) . This keeps the curls defined, frizz away, all without drying. EXCELLENT stuff. I hope they never stop making this. My curls depend on it! Update 5. 25. 16 - just ordered 4 more units of this . I seriously can't live without this for my hair. The best product I've used in years.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Guzzino

customer_reviews.title: Been using it for 13 years
customer_reviews.text: My all time favorite styling product for my extremely curly hair. I’ve been using this for 13 years and have tried everything else out there - this is the secret for your frizzy hair. I wish I found this in middle school (I’m now 32).
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Tibbetts

customer_reviews.title: Not sticky and weightless!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this hair product. My hair is thin and wavy/curly. Everything, and I mean EVERYTHING, I've tried has made my hair look sticky, crunchy, greasy, flat, etc. This makes my hair look natural and as if there is no product in my hair. My waves/curls have bounce, body, and are frizz-free. I use this with a diffuser and it has changed my life. The product is creamy and super sticky in your hands. I don't know how it transfers to hair without the same feeling. I have to give my hands a good scrub to make sure the sticky residue is completely off of my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany + Robo

customer_reviews.title: Try this!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this once (air dried hair), but I really like it! I have fine, wavy/curly hair (shoulder length) and this product did not leave my hair crispy, stringy, or greasy looking (and I only had to use a little more than a pea-sized amount).
customer_reviews.author: Ciara Cole

customer_reviews.title: I googled an article on best products for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised by this product! I googled an article on best products for curly hair, and this was recommended. Was a good choice. Kept my frizzy curls neat and together, when my hair becomes dry, I just scruntch it a bit to release the crunchy quality it first has. But when the gel cast is released, it is quite soft. To refreshen day old curls, I just dab some water on them with a hint of product too. I have been a Ouidad user for some time now, but am seeking a less expensive alternative. I believe I found it!
customer_reviews.author: Karan W-W the Potter

customer_reviews.title: Big Glitch!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Followed the suggestion in one of the reviews to towel dry and wrap for about 20 minutes! Great results! BUT one of the two-pack would not pump out any product and it is not returnable! Very disappointing!!!
customer_reviews.author: prae

product_meta.title: TIGI Catwalk Curls Rock Amplifier, 5.07 Oz
product_meta.description: Size:1 PackFor Definition and Separation. Provides hold and control for defined curls and streamlined waves by enhancing natural texture. Helps protect against humidity.
feature_bullets: Polymers, Thermal and Environmental Protectants, Essential Oils.
Provides hold and control for defined curls and streamlined waves by enhancing natural texture
Apply to towel dried hair from mid lengths to ends.
